title: mempoolspecs â€” Mempool Goggles Port
blurb: Portable, mempool.space-compatible goggles UI: fee bands, queue depth, and confirmation horizons.
description: mempoolspecs is a UI component set and thin client that re-creates a mempool 'goggles'-style visualization. It consumes mempool.space-like APIs (or your own mirror) to show fee bands (sat/vB), queued virtual MB equivalents per band, and estimated confirmation windows, with a compact status rail. It can operate read-only against public endpoints or local infrastructure.
